name: Keep Fighting On
description:
Summary

Keep Fighting On is a simple action game where you play as the only surviving knight in a fierce battle against strange, soul absorbing monsters trying to attack your home. However, hope is not lost as the knight has mysteriously gained the power to summon fallen allies through collection of the souls absorbed by the monsters.

Survive by defeating the enemies before you, collect the souls they release and summon your allies to assist you in battle.

Controls

Press WASD or Up Down Left Right to move around.

Press Space to attack.

Hold Left Shift to sprint.

Left click on an ally's name to summon them.

Credits

Music was made by: Cafofo

Other assets such as 3D models and sound effects were made by me.
